entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
